content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the google command to search for hiking trails near Brno and received a list of results. I then used the browse_website command to gather information on the Brno Reservoir trail. I tested my internet connection using execute_python_code and pinged google.com successfully. I used the google command to search for the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. I then used the browse_website command to gather information on these locations from lonelyplanet.com. I attempted to execute_shell to open the recommended links, but encountered an error. I used web_search to find relevant information on these locations and downloaded travel guides for Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. I used the google command to search for the Brno Reservoir trail and received a list of results. I then used the browse_website command to gather information on the trail. I attempted to execute_python_code and encountered an error, but successfully executed the brno_reservoir_trail.py file. I used web_search to find information on the Brno Reservoir trail and downloaded a travel guide.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
